name: Machine Gun Powered Vehicle
description:
A game specifically made for the xkcd  Game Jam. In this case the game was based on this "What if?" article (22).

You need to get out of here but your car has broken and it won't work anymore, it already was in great disrepair. What do you do? You install a machine gun on top of your car, of course! Press space to fire the machine gun and try to reach the maximum distance possible, good luck! Controls:
  • P: Pause
  • R: Restart
  • Spacebar: Fire
  • ←: Torque "backwards" (Not working correctly in the original version)
  • →: Torque "forwards"     (Not working correctly in the original version)
  • Alt+ F4: Exit
